biocontainers.name: xatlas
biocontainers.summary: xAtlas is a fast and retrainable small variant caller that has been developed at the Baylor College of Medicine Human Genome Sequencing Center.

biotools.summary: Scalable small variant calling across heterogeneous next-generation sequencing experiments.
